summary: Defines a command‑line driven training routine for a graph neural network explainer using DGL synthetic datasets. It parses arguments, loads a selected dataset, constructs the model, runs the training loop with PyTorch, and saves the trained graphs and checkpoints.
business_intent: Enable researchers or developers to quickly train and evaluate GNN explainability models on benchmark graph datasets, facilitating experimentation and integration of explainable AI capabilities into graph‑based products.
